org.eclipse.papyrus.MARTE.MARTE_Foundations.GRM

Interface TimerResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier, Resource, TimingResource
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    SwTimerResource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SwTimerResourceImpl, TimerResourceImpl

    public interface TimerResource
extends TimingResource
    A representation of the model object 'Timer Resource'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Duration
    • Is Periodic
    See Also:
    GRMPackage.getTimerResource()
